content:
From: Andrei Popescu <andrei.h.popescu@gmail.com>
Dear Colleagues,

The 2025 Computer Science Colloquium of the London Mathematical
Society will take place on 9 December and will feature an excellent
line-up of speakers. Registration is free but required in advance.
Details are below.

Location: De Morgan House, London, UK & online via Zoom
Date: 9 December 2025
Time: 10:00 -- 16:00
Speakers: Julia BÃ¶ttcher (LSE), Richard Mycroft (University of
Birmingham), Namrata (University of Liverpool), Parinya Chalermsook
(University of Sheffield)

Registration page (including access to the Zoom link for remote attendance):
https://www.lms.ac.uk/events/lms-computer-science-colloquium-2025

Best wishes,
Andrei
